description: On (2n+1)X(2n+1) board, let m(i)=number of squares i knight's moves from center; sequence gives max m(i), i=0,...
references: Problem E2605*, Labels on a Chessboard, proposed by Andreas P. Hadjipolakis, Anopolis Sfakion, Crete, Greece, Am. Math. Monthly Vol. 83 (1976), no. 7 (Aug-Sept.), p. 566. Solution: Vol. 84 (1977), p. 822 by Roger Weitzenkamp.
author: Antreas P. Hatzipolakis (xpolakis(AT)hol.gr)
